fixes.name: Commission %
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated Tableau SUM and ABS to DAX SUM and ABS. Referenced calculated fields using 'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Column] format. Kept the same arithmetic structure: SUM([Commission Total]) divided by ABS(SUM([Profit])).
fixes.type_changed_reason: This calculation uses aggregation (SUM), so it should be created as a measure.
